flavor_text_entries.gold:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its fluffy fleece
easily stores
electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps
it from being
electrocuted.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Because of its
rubbery, electric­
ity-resistant skin, it can store
lots of electric­
ity in its fur.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
FLAAFFY’s wool quality changes so that
it can generate a high amount of static
electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are
shielded against electricity.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
FLAAFFY’s wool quality changes so that
it can generate a high amount of static
electricity with a small amount of wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are
shielded against electricity.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its fleece quality changes to generate
strong static electricity with a small
amount of wool. The bare, slick parts of its
hide are shielded against electricity.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its fluffy fleece easily stores
electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it
from being electrocuted.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
As a result of storing too much
electricity, it developed patches where
even downy wool won’t grow.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
If its coat becomes fully charged
with electricity, its tail lights up.
It fires hair that zaps on impact.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
If its coat becomes fully charged
with electricity, its tail lights up.
It fires hair that zaps on impact.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
If its coat becomes fully charged
with electricity, its tail lights up.
It fires hair that zaps on impact.

As a result of storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy wool won’t grow.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its fluffy fleece easily stores
electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps

flavor_text_entries.black:
If its coat becomes fully charged
with electricity, its tail lights up.
It fires hair that zaps on impact.
flavor_text_entries.white:
If its coat becomes fully charged
with electricity, its tail lights up.
It fires hair that zaps on impact.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Not even downy wool will grow on
its rubbery, nonconductive patches
of skin that prevent electrical shock.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Not even downy wool will grow on
its rubbery, nonconductive patches
of skin that prevent electrical shock.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery
hide keeps it from being electrocuted.
flavor_text_entries.y:
If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity,
its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Flaaffy’s wool quality changes so that it can generate a high
amount of static electricity with a small amount of wool.
The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded
against electricity.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Flaaffy’s wool quality changes so that it can generate
a high amount of static electricity with a small amount of
wool. The bare and slick parts of its hide are shielded
against electricity.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
In the places on its body where fleece doesn’t
grow, its skin is rubbery and doesn’t conduct
electricity. Those spots are safe to touch.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it
stores up too much, it will start to go bald in
those patches.
